text: is a Japanese semi-professional football club in the Japan Football League.FC is an acronym. FC stands for "Footbal Club". The team's home is Moriyama in Shiga Prefecture.Soccerway.com, Sagawa Shiga FC; retrieved 2012-3-2. == Name == The club formed from a merger of two Sagawa Express corporation football clubs in 2007 -- Sagawa Express Tokyo SC + Sagawa Express Osaka SC * 2007 Sagawa Express SC * 2008–present Sagawa Shiga FC == League title == * Japan Football League : 1 ** 2007 == League position == Season League Position 2007 Football League Champions 2008 Football League 12th === as Sagawa Express Tokyo === * 2001 : Football League – 4th * 2002 : Football League – 2nd * 2003 : Football League – 5th * 2004 : Football League – 7th * 2005 : Football League – 6th * 2006 : Football League – 2nd === as Sagawa Express Osaka === * 2002 : Football League – 9th * 2003 : Football League – 4th * 2004 : Football League – 11th * 2005 : Football League – 10th * 2006 : Football League – 3rd ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams == References == ==Other websites== * Sagawa Shiga FC website * JFL, Sagawa Shiga Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Shiga Prefecture
title: Sagawa Shiga FC
